title: Teman Minum Kopi
description: Compilations of essays and short stories by Indonesian people who live overseas about how they try to adjust with their new lifestyle, culture,society and community in the country they live now. Good reference for those who are planning to move to other country or just curious how Indonesian survive in many different countries. Written by 8 Indonesians who live in Canada, France, Germany, Switzerland, Macau-China and Japan.
author: Zara Zettira Z.R.
